ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk, 1 cup rolled oats, 2 tablespoons honey,   +   1/4 cup coconut flakes (Optional), 2 tablespoons brown sugar, or more to taste, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
nutrition: Total Fat 35g 44%, Saturated Fat 30g 148%, Sodium 25mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 45g 16%, Dietary Fiber 6g 21%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 2mg 8%, Calcium 56mg 4%, Iron 6mg 33%, Potassium 450mg 10%
